member.name: T:CSI.Unicard.API.Controllers.OrderController
member.summary: Controller for managing orders.

member.name: M:CSI.Unicard.API.Controllers.OrderController.#ctor(CSI.Unicard.Application.Interfaces.IOrderService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{CSI.Unicard.API.Controllers.OrderController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CSI.Unicard.API.Controllers.OrderController.Add(CSI.Unicard.Domain.Models.Orders)
member.summary: Adds a new order.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation, with an IActionResult containing the result.

member.name: M:CSI.Unicard.API.Controllers.OrderController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an order by its ID.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation, with a Response containing the order.

member.name: M:CSI.Unicard.API.Controllers.OrderController.GetAll
member.summary: Gets all orders.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation, with a Response containing a list of orders.

member.name: M:CSI.Unicard.API.Controllers.OrderController.DeleteById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes an order by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the order to delete.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
